text.div:
Vaccination Protocol Dose Status Reason codes

A bunch of example codes

This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/ig-template/CodeSystem/doseStatusReason-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Reason1 Reason1Vaccine Dose Administered was administered after the Lot Number Expiration Date.
Reason2 Reason2Vaccine Dose Administered was deemed to be ineffective or sub-potent. (e.g. recalled, cold-chain break, partially administered).
Reason3 Reason3Vaccine Dose Administered was administered at too young of an age.
Reason4 Reason4Vaccine Dose Administered was administered too soon following a previous dose.
Reason5 Reason5Vaccine Dose Administered was administered too close to another vaccine (e.g. live virus conflict).
Reason6 Reason6Vaccine Dose Administered amount was less than the recommended amount.
Reason7 Reason7Vaccine Dose Administered was administered outside of an acceptable age range

name: Vaccination Protocol Dose Status Reason codes
